name: WaystoCap, Inc.
description: Provider of a cross-border B2B marketplace designed to connect buyers and sellers. The company's B2B marketplace is an eCommerce platform that helps in quick delivery and provide daily deals, discounts and offers, enabling businesses in obtaining financing and insurance, managing their shipments and ensuring payments security.
one_liner: Provider of a cross-border B2B marketplace designed to connect buyers and sellers. The company's B2B marketplace is an eCommerce platform that helps in quick delivery and provide daily deals, discounts and offers, enabling businesses in obtaining financing and insurance, managing their shipments and ensuring payments security.
